text: I've cleaned up the docs a bit and split all plotting functions and layoutables out into their own pages. That gives them a bit more room for better / more exhaustive examples. Some examples I've already split up, but PR's for examples that you've been missing are also welcome.

text:
I plan to update the arrows docs in my pr when I find time, maybe we can merge it after that too.

I guess some text explaining what attributes do would also be welcome?
